title: Battlefield 2 + Crack and Keygen
description:
Okay so here&#039;s the deal.

1. Download DVD Decrypter from this link: 

2. Put in a blank DVD with enough space.

3. Burn the Battlefield 2.iso file with DVD Decrypter

4. Put in the DVD you&#039;ve just burnt.

5. Start Installing the game.

6. When the Serial number icon comes up open the Keygen.

7. Write the number from the Keygen to the Serial number place and just click next.

8. When you&#039;re finished with the install go to the Battlefield 2 Installation folder.

9. Delete the BF2.exe file.

10. After you deleted it, replace it with the cracked BF2.exe



If you have followed my instructions completely it will work 100% Guaranteed!
